org.ajgl.graphics

Class Graphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ajgl.graphics.Graphics

  • public final class Graphics
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to handle Vertex Buffered Object creation and drawing.
    Author:
    Tyler Bucher

    • Method Detail

      • createVboHandler

        public static int createVboHandler(float[] vboPoints)
        Creates the Vertex Buffered Object specified by vboPoints.
        Parameters:
        vboPoints - - The float array of vertex coordinates for the vertex buffered object; n(x, y, z)
        Returns:
        The id of the Vertex Buffered Object

      • drawShape

        public static void drawShape(int vertexHandler,
                             int colorHandler,
                             int numVertexPoint,
                             int numColorPoint,
                             int vertices,
                             int GL_SHAPE_TYPE)
        Draws as shape using vertex buffered objects.
        Parameters:
        vertexHandler - - The integer value associated with the vertex data handler
        colorHandler - - The integer value associated with the color data handler
        numVertexPoint - - The number of points per vertex data (i.e. 1-1D, 2-2D, 3-3D)
        numColorPoint - - The number of points per color data (i.e. 3-RGB, 4-RGBA)
        vertices - - The number of vertices the shape contains
        GL_SHAPE_TYPE - - The Open-GL shape type

      • drawShape

        public static void drawShape(int vertexHandler,
                             int textureHandler,
                             int numVertexPoint,
                             int numTexturePoint,
                             int vertices,
                             int GL_SHAPE_TYPE,
                             org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture)
        Draws as shape using vertex buffered objects.
        Parameters:
        vertexHandler - - The integer value associated with the vertex data handler
        textureHandler - - The integer value associated with the texture data handler
        numVertexPoint - - The number of points per vertex data (i.e. 1-1D, 2-2D, 3-3D)
        numTexturePoint - - The number of points per Texture (i.e. 1-1D, 2-2D, 3-3D)
        vertices - - The number of vertices the shape contains
        GL_SHAPE_TYPE - - The Open-GL shape type
        texture - - The texture object associated with the texture

      • drawShape

        public static void drawShape(int vertexHandler,
                             int colorHandler,
                             int textureHandler,
                             int numVertexPoint,
                             int numColorPoint,
                             int numTexturePoint,
                             int vertices,
                             int GL_SHAPE_TYPE,
                             org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture)
        Draws as shape using vertex buffered objects.
        Parameters:
        vertexHandler - - The integer value associated with the vertex data handler
        colorHandler - - The integer value associated with the color data handler
        textureHandler - - The integer value associated with the texture data handler
        numVertexPoint - - The number of points per vertex data (i.e. 1-1D, 2-2D, 3-3D)
        numColorPoint - - The number of points per color data (i.e. 3-RGB, 4-RGBA)
        numTexturePoint - - The number of points per Texture (i.e. 1-1D, 2-2D, 3-3D)
        vertices - - The number of vertices the shape contains
        GL_SHAPE_TYPE - - The Open-GL shape type
        texture - - The texture object associated with the texture

      • clearVboHandler

        public static boolean clearVboHandler(int handler)
        Deletes/removes the specified vertex buffered object handler.

      • clearVboHandlers

        public static void clearVboHandlers()
        Deletes/removes all of the vertex buffered object handlers.
